help-file.title: "GOD, POOFIN" "GOD, POOFOUT"
help-file.content:
"poofin <text>" sets up the message for when you "goto" a room. This replaces the default "ear-splitting bang" message we are used to seeing. To get the default back, just type poofin with no argument.
"Poofout" is the same as poofin, except is is the message seen by people in the room you are leaving when you do a "goto."
To see what your current poofin/-out is, type "poofin ?" or "poofout?"
